text: Kurtwood Larson Smith (born July 3, 1943) is an American television and movie actor. He is known for playing the main antagonist Clarence Boddicker in RoboCop and as Red Forman in That '70s Show. He is also known for his appearances in the genre of science fiction (Star Trek, The X-Files). He also starred in 24. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Wisconsin
title: Kurtwood Smith
